question: What programming languages do you support?
answer: We support Python JavaScript TypeScript Java C++ Go Rust Ruby and PHP with syntax highlighting and autocomplete

question: How do I debug my code?
answer: Use our integrated debugger by clicking the bug icon. Set breakpoints by clicking the line numbers and use F5 to start debugging

question: Can I collaborate with my team?
answer: Yes! Share your project link with team members. They can view and edit in real-time. Use the Share button in the top menu

question: What is the maximum file size?
answer: Individual files can be up to 100MB. Total project size is limited to 5GB on free plans and 50GB on premium plans

question: How do I deploy my application?
answer: Click the Deploy button choose your hosting provider (AWS GCP Azure or our managed hosting) and follow the deployment wizard

question: Do you offer dark mode?
answer: Yes! Click the theme icon in the top right corner. Choose from Light Dark or Auto (follows system preferences)

question: How do I import existing projects?
answer: Go to File > Import and select your project folder. We support importing from GitHub GitLab and Bitbucket

question: What keyboard shortcuts are available?
answer: Press Ctrl+K (Cmd+K on Mac) to open the command palette and see all available shortcuts. You can also customize shortcuts in Settings

question: Can I use environment variables?
answer: Yes! Create a .env file in your project root. Access variables using process.env.VARIABLE_NAME in your code

question: How do I install packages?
answer: Use the terminal (Ctrl+`) and run npm install package-name for Node.js or pip install package-name for Python

question: Is version control included?
answer: Yes! Built-in Git integration. Commit push and pull directly from the editor. View history and create branches easily

question: How do I get help?
answer: Click the Help icon for documentation. Join our Discord community or email support@example.com for assistance

question: Can I work offline?
answer: Yes! Enable offline mode in Settings. Your work syncs automatically when you reconnect to the internet

question: What security features do you have?
answer: We use end-to-end encryption for data transfer 2FA for accounts and SOC 2 Type II certified infrastructure

question: How do I upgrade my plan?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Billing. Compare plans and click Upgrade. You only pay the difference prorated for the current month
